stimulusHtml:
A business analyst is investigating whether the mean amount of purchases made by customers at an online department store is greater than $100. The analyst obtained a random sample of 56 orders and calculated a sample mean of $102.30 and a sample standard deviation of $5.30.

Which of the following is an appropriate test for the investigation?
choicesHtml: A one-sample t-test for a population mean
A one-sample t-test for a sample mean
A one-sample z-test for a population proportion
A two-sample t-test for a difference between population means
A matched-pairs t-test for a mean difference
